text.div:
CARIN RTPBC Patient Pay Type Code System

This code system defines components of a patient's responsibility for a prescription product's cost.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin/CodeSystem/rtpbc-patient-pay-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
deductible DeductibleAmount to be collected from a patient to be applied to a periodic deductible.
coinsurance Per prescription coinsuranceAmount to be collected from a patient to satisfy a per prescription coinsurance.
copay CopayAmount to be collected from the patient to satisfy a per prescription copay.
tax TaxAmount to be collected from the patient for sales tax.
other OtherOther amount to be collected from the patient
total Total patient responsibilityAmount equalling the total patient responsibility for a prescription product's cost.

name: CarinRtpbcPatientPayTypeCodeSystem
title: CARIN RTPBC Patient Pay Type Code System
description: This code system defines components of a patient's responsibility for a prescription product's cost.
purpose: This code system defines components of a patient's responsibility for a prescription product's cost.

concept.definition: Amount to be collected from a patient to be applied to a periodic deductible.
Amount to be collected from a patient to satisfy a per prescription coinsurance.
Amount to be collected from the patient to satisfy a per prescription copay.
Amount to be collected from the patient for sales tax.
Other amount to be collected from the patient
Amount equalling the total patient responsibility for a prescription product's cost.
